label: A2B_tI24_141_2e_e-001
title: Ga$_{2}$Hf Structure
comments: When $z_{1}=1/4$, $z_{2}=5/12$, and $z_{3}=1/12$, the atoms are on the sites of \href{current_web_home_dir/A_tI2_139_a-001}{indium ($A6$) body-centered tetragonal lattice}.  If, in this case, $c=6a$, the atoms are on the sites of a face-centered cubic lattice, and if $c = 3\sqrt{2} a$, the atoms are on the site of a body-centered cubic lattice. This lattice is placed with the face-centered cubic lattices because most known structures have $c$ near $6a$.
